subcategory.name: Stats
subcategory.description: Stats card examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS stats components to include data insights, such as analytics, metrics, or financial information, in your interface. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
